name: SevenStars Galleria Milano

reviews.text: Well, it is somehow difficult to review this hotel objectively.
reviews.title: Great 4-star hotel (but 7 stars is a lie!)

reviews.text: 1) You can't deny that it has great service and location
reviews.title: Unique Wonderful Experience

reviews.text: 2) The style of the interior design might be personal, but I think that if you have the chance to stay in Milan you better go to the Bulgari or Chedi Hotel, more consistent and less kitsch! But that is personal and I do acknowledge that many people like it and that the old architecture is fantastic
reviews.title: Super expensive, nothing more!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 3) What bugs me is that they say that they are a seven star hotel. They are not! Because as everyone should know stars are attributed based on infrastructure, not service level or attentiveness. This hotel does not have a pool!!! Every 5 star hotel needs to have a pool. They also do not have a Spa which also is demanded by today's discerning traveler. So that means the hotel can be a maximum of 4 stars.
reviews.title: A hidden gem in Milan and wonderful stuff

reviews.text: To sum up. Great city hotel with great service and great location but the demand for 7 stars is just plain arrogant.
reviews.title: A fabulous experience in the heart of Milan...

reviews.text: The stay was an absolute disaster. It was strange being in a hotel pretending to have the highest security procedures (codes to enter the hotel and the rooms) and being STOLEN. Some money was taken in our safety case by some member of the staff. The last day, when packing, we discovered that an ipod was missing. Even if they found it back they implied that it was us who had hide it! The location is great although if you need silence to sleep this is not the place. There is noise all night long in the galleria Vittorio Emanuelle. The staff is nice and gentle but for a hotel pretending to be a seven stars hotel there was some lack of professionalism. The management was never or almost never there.
reviews.title: Total Disaster - we were stolen

reviews.text: We stayed there for a week. It was truly a wonderful experience. I would like to thank the management, the butlers, the chef, the drivers - all the staff! The hotel is amazing, everything is perfect. The location is great, all of the places of interest are within a few minutes walk. The service is beyond fantastic, very friendly and caring. It was our first time in MIlano and the hotel staff has really made us feel like home. We have been recommending it to everyone since we got back. Thank you again Town House Galleria. You guys are the best!
reviews.title: The Best Hotel In The World!

reviews.text: We just returned from Milan and a 3 night stay at this wonderful hotel. We were treated like royalty.
reviews.title: Unbelievable Service, Comfort and Location

description: Seven Stars Galleria is the first certified 7-star hotel in Europe. Perfectly located in the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II, the historic heart of Milan, it is the only Italian hotel situated in a national monument. Designed by the famous architect Ettore Mocchetti, the seven contemporary style magnificent Suites, overlooking the stunning Galleria, offer an intimate, tranquil and elegant hideaway. The exclusive service is held in high esteem by a very personal butler in an absolute private atmosphere. This refined luxury home is located just a few steps from Milan’s most important attractions such as the Duomo, "Alla Scala" Theatre, the "Sforzesco" castle, Via Monte Napoleone and the Leonardo’s Last Supper. The Hotels exclusive services include limousine private transfers and Valet parking service. Seven Stars Galleria is also home of "La Sinfonia" Restaurant and "Le Sale del Re" events area.
